name: fitbit-health-dashboard
tagline: A self-hosted dashboard for visualizing Fitbit health and activity data
description: Fitbit-Grafana is a monitoring stack that extracts Fitbit data and visualizes it using Grafana dashboards. Great for individuals who want to self-host personal health analytics while keeping their activity data private.

features.title: Fitbit Data Collection
features.description: Import health and activity data from Fitbit accounts

features.title: Grafana Dashboard Integration
features.description: Visualize health metrics using Grafana dashboards

features.title: Activity Tracking
features.description: Display steps, distance, and activity duration over time

features.title: Sleep Metrics Visualization
features.description: View sleep duration and sleep stage summaries

features.title: Heart Rate Monitoring
features.description: Plot heart rate trends and daily averages

features.title: Time-Series Storage
features.description: Store collected metrics for historical analysis
